授業目的: This graduate course aims for enhancing student-researcher critical thinking and analysis on different policy (problem -cum- politics) arena with comparative case studies on: conceptual issues and empirical findings of comparative socio-policy researches.
到達目標: Learners can make critical policy analyses and proposals with relevant theories and empirical findings in different comparative arena: they can work effectively with international, cross-cultural and multi-diciplinary research project as key-researcher, or better as team-leader, for academic, policy consultancy, nongovernmental and inter-governmental bodies.
